Indolence an Open Door to Temptation.--Mothers, give your children enough to do. . . . Indolence will not be favorable to physical, mental, or moral health. It throws open the door and invites Satan in, which opportunity he improves, and draws the young into his snares. By indolence not only the moral strength is weakened, and the impulse of passion increased, but Satan's angels take possession of the whole citadel of the mind and 
                                                                           463
compel conscience to surrender to vile passion. We should teach our children habits of patient industry.
